summary: Atheism is the belief that there are no gods or deities. It is the opposite of theism, which is the belief in at least one god. People who are atheists think there is not enough evidence to prove that gods exist. This way of thinking has a long history and can be found in ancient writings and philosophies. In recent times, atheism has become more common, with estimates suggesting up to 1.1 billion people worldwide are atheists.
title: Atheism
